query: SELECT testId, testName, givenContext, whenAction, thenOutcome, additionalExpectations FROM testRegistry WHERE testType = 'bdd' ORDER BY testSuite, testId
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2TnkFjGBKdfpupi.root --database B3x5NWCFiG4wF9DctXvqsL --execute SELECT testId, testName, givenContext, whenAction, thenOutcome, additionalExpectations FROM testRegistry WHERE testType = 'bdd' ORDER BY testSuite, testId

rows.testName: Half Day Workshop focuses on #1 critical area
rows.givenContext: a user selects "Half Day Workshop" as their training type
rows.whenAction: they complete the assessment and view results
rows.thenOutcome: they should see: Training cost: $2,000, Duration: 4 hours, Focus: Only the #1 highest priority driver
rows.additionalExpectations: recommendations should be filtered to show only that driver AND ROI should be calculated based on improving 1/7 of the gap

rows.testName: ROI calculated using gap-based improvement model
rows.givenContext: a user completes an assessment with specific scores
rows.thenOutcome: it should use this formula: totalGap = 0.85 - currentReadiness, improvementPerDriver = totalGap / 7, totalImprovement = improvementPerDriver × focusAreas, currentDysfunction = 1 - currentReadiness, projectedSavings = annualCostOfDysfunction × (totalImprovement / currentDysfunction), roi = (projectedSavings - trainingCost) / trainingCost

rows.testName: Training type descriptions meet 4.5:1 contrast ratio
rows.givenContext: a user views the training options on the assessment page
rows.whenAction: they read the training type descriptions
rows.thenOutcome: the text should have a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1 against the background
rows.additionalExpectations: the text should be readable in both light and dark modes
